mc.name: Villainous Ogre

Fear

Fear

mc.flavorText:

--Meloku the Clouded Mirror

mc.name: Deathcurse Ogre
mc.oracleText: When Deathcurse Ogre is put into a graveyard from play, each player loses 3 life.
mc.printedText: When Deathcurse Ogre is put into a graveyard from play, each player loses 3 life.
mc.flavorText: After their worship of oni began, only a few of Kamigawa's ogres remained in the bitter cold of the Tendo Peaks. Most were drawn to the darkness of Takenuma.

mc.name: Sideswipe
mc.oracleText: You may change any targets of target Arcane spell.
mc.printedText: You may change any targets of target Arcane spell.
mc.flavorText: Hisoka's wizards struggled for years to master the art of redirection that came so naturally to the shamans of Ganzan Pass.

mc.name: Dosan the Falling Leaf
mc.oracleText: Players can play spells only during their own turns.
mc.printedText: Players can play spells only during their own turns.
mc.flavorText:
"Each night as Master Dosan prays to the kami, the hate he receives in return withers his body a little more. Though the kami are slowly killing him, still he continues his prayers."
--Meditation journal of a young budoka

mc.name: Jukai Messenger
mc.oracleText: Forestwalk
mc.printedText: Forestwalk
mc.flavorText: Dosan's monks, deep in spiritual thought, could walk through the thickest of forests without leaving a mark, even the leaves beneath their feet unaffected by their passing.

mc.name: Ethereal Haze
mc.oracleText: Prevent all damage that would be dealt by creatures this turn.
mc.printedText: Prevent all damage that would be dealt by creatures this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Imagine a dove flying through smoke. Does the dove injure the smoke? Does the smoke impede the dove?"
--Teachings of Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

mc.name: Nature's Will
mc.oracleText: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.
mc.printedText: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.
mc.flavorText:
"Without the kami to speak to nature on our behalf, we must beg help from nature directly."
--Seshiro the Anointed

mc.name: Jade Idol

mc.printedText: Whenever you play a Spirit or Arcane spell, Jade Idol becomes a 4/4 Spirit artifact creature until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Before the Kami War, the shishi were symbolic guardians, protecting the shrines where they stood. But after the kami turned on the material world, shishi began pouncing from their perches to attack would-be supplicants.
